data.name: Where Is My Parking Spot - Parking Reimagined
data.detailed_description:
Where Is My Parking Spot: Parking Reimagined takes raging to the next level, Crash once and you fail, Do you have the skill to master all of the parking spots?!


  • Near Miss! Get to close to a parked car? Carful! you could hit them!
  • No Brakes Parking slows down for nobody!
  • And More!... Can you find all of the risky moves!?


  • Beat your time. Can you get a new record? Show everyone that you are the boss?!
  • Leaderboards! Beat other player's times and come out on top!
  • Cloud Saves! No need to lose progress! That cloud in the sky has your back!


  • Epic cars to collect! Can you unlock all the cars?!
  • Park In Style! Looking good while you park is the best way to go!
  • Show off! Take your cars to Multiplayer!

data.short_description: Not-So Classic Games, brings you the sequel to Where Is My Parking Spot. Drive, Drift and Slide your way to that special parking spot of yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X 10.11 (El Capitan) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • Additional Notes: 32-bit OS can crash. 64-bit OS is required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
